pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 15, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 15, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Meeting.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 1:00 p.m


1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Romania, Dacian Ciolo»ô.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
